channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 08:34 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community.
item.description: 游리 08:34 The threat of a shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:34 Attention! Please note that anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
